java实现带过期时间的lru

Jul 28, 2022

用java实现带缓存时间的lru,只是一个简单的例子，还有很多不足，例如lru中的元素过期了不能及时删除，只有在put或者get的时候才会进行删除操作，同时，对于put了相同key的元素，没有更新该元素的时间戳以及新值

package com.example.demo;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * @author: elon
 * @date: 2022/7/28
 **/
public class LRU<K,V> {

    private Map<K,V> valueMap = new HashMap<>();

    private Node<K> head = new Node<>();

    private Node<K> tail = head;
    private int limit;

    private long lifeCycle;
    private int size;

    public LRU (int limit, long lifeCycle) {
        this.limit = limit;
        this.lifeCycle = lifeCycle;
    }

    public V get(K key) {
        long current = System.currentTimeMillis();
        if (this.valueMap.getOrDefault(key, null) == null) {
            return null;
        }
        Node t = findeNode(key);
        if ((current - t.timestamp) > this.lifeCycle) {
            removeAllAfter(key);
            return null;
        }

        remove(key);
        Node node = new Node(key,current);
        add2Head(node);
        print();
        return valueMap.get(key);
    }

    public void print() {
        Node p = this.head;
        while(p.next != null) {
            System.out.print(p.next.key + "\t");
            p = p.next;
        }
        System.out.println();
    }
    public void put(K key, V value) {
        long current = System.currentTimeMillis();
        Node<K> node = new Node<>(key,current);
        if (expire(current) || this.size == this.limit) {
            remove(this.tail.key);
            this.valueMap.remove(this.tail.key);
        }
        add2Head(node);
        this.valueMap.put(key, value);
        print();
    }

    private void add2Head(Node node) {
        Node headNext = this.head.next;
        this.head.next = node;
        node.pre = this.head;
        node.next = headNext;
        if (this.size == 0) {
            tail = node;
        }
        if (headNext != null) {
            headNext.pre = node;
        }
        this.size += 1;
    }

    private void removeAllAfter(K key) {
        Node node = findeNode(key);
        Node pre = node.pre;
        pre.next = null;
        tail = pre;

        int cnt = 0;
        while (node != null) {
            valueMap.remove(node.key);
            cnt++;
            node = node.next;
        }
        this.size -= cnt;
    }

    private void remove(K key) {
        if (key == tail.key) {
            Node tailPre = tail.pre;
            tailPre.next = null;
            tail = tailPre;
        } else {
            Node p = this.head;
            while(p.next != null) {
                if (p.next.key == key) {
                    Node next = p.next.next;
                    p.next = next;
                    next.pre = p;
                    break;
                }
                p = p.next;
            }
        }
        this.size -= 1;
    }
    
    private Node findeNode(K key) {
        Node p = this.head;
        while (p.next != null) {
            if (p.next.key == key) {
                return p.next;
            }
            p = p.next;
        }
        return null;
    }

    private boolean expire(long current) {
        if (this.tail.timestamp == 0) {return false;}
        return (current - this.tail.timestamp) > this.lifeCycle;
    }
    static class Node<K> {
        long timestamp;
        K key;
        Node<K> pre;
        Node<K> next;

        public Node(K key, long timestamp) {
            this.key = key;
            this.timestamp = timestamp;
        }
        public Node(){}
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        LRU<String,Integer> lru = new LRU<>(3,1000);
        lru.put("001",1);
        lru.put("002",2);
        lru.put("003",3);
        lru.get("003");
        lru.put("004",4);
        lru.put("005",5);
        lru.put("006",6);
    }
}
